<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;">Sounds good.  Count me in on the test.  By the way, some here might be interested in knowing that the American Association of EVP did a similar blind test and their results showed about a 33% hit rate for people getting the same words from a file.  That would be a pretty good number to match, I would think.  Sarcasum can be an effective way to make things happen at times. And that's not being sarcastic.   lol   ron<BR><BR>
